Executive Compensation
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The committee that runs the Orange Bowl increased the pay of its chief executive by nearly $150,000 in 2009, boosting his compensation to more than $500,000.
snippet: The committee that runs the Orange Bowl increased the pay of its chief executive by nearly $150,000 in 2009, boosting his compensation to more than $500,000.
